title: In One Year and Out the Other
description: An effervescent compilation of romantic short stories set against the backdrop of the New Year's Eve celebration features Cara Lockwood's " A New Year's Resolution List," as well as other works by Pamela Redmond Satran, Eileen Rendahl, Megan McAndrew, Kathleen O'Reilly, Beth Kendrick, Diane Stingley, Tracy McArdle, and Libby Street. Reprint.
author: Cara Lockwood
